Key Match Events: Bam Adebayo contributed 15 points, seven rebounds, three assists, three steals and two blocked shots in the victory. Adebayo hit two buckets in a row with under three minutes left to break an 86-86 tie.
Herro and Jaquez each drained key free throws in the waning moments as Miami improved to 2-1 on its six-game trip.
Jaquez put Miami up by five by sinking two foul shots with 11.8 left to clinch the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Neither team shot well, with the Jazz making 39.8 percent of their shots and the Heat shooting 39.6 percent.
